definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Memories of culture are kept in streets and alleys of Taichung City.
sentences.chinese: 文化的記憶也保存在臺中市的街頭巷弄裏。

sentences.english: Do you live in a suburb of Taichung?
sentences.chinese: 你住在臺中市的郊區嗎？

sentences.english: Xinzhu was rated the most liveable place behind Taipei, followed by Tainan and Taizhong cities.
sentences.chinese: 新竹的名次僅次於臺北，接著是臺南及臺中市。

sentences.english: This photo shows the outside of Taichung Rear Station in Taichung City.
sentences.chinese: 這張圖顯示在臺中市的臺中後站外面景象。

sentences.english: The office is based in the Beitun District of Taichung.
sentences.chinese: 公司的位置在臺中市北屯區。

sentences.english: He is currently staying in Taichung and teaching in Tung Shan High School.
sentences.chinese: 他現居於臺中並於臺中市立東山高中教授英文。

definition: Taoyuan city in north Taiwan, capital of Taoyuan county
Zhanghua or Changhua county in west Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan
Chung Yuan Christian University, in Taiwan
Taizhong or Taichung city in central Taiwan
Taoyuan city and county in Taiwan
elementary school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民小學|国民小学[guo2 min2 xiao3 xue2]
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
